description:
Description
- A dynamic volume spray crafted with Hydrolyzed Collagen and Proteins to boost volume while nurturing your hair. - This lightweight spray ensures up to 12 hours of voluminous, bouncy style without any stickiness or residue. - Hypoallergenic and gentle on the scalp, it's ideal for daily use, providing a durable, silky finish for an effortless sophisticated look.
 - Hydrolyzed collagen restores hair structure, giving it elasticity and lushness. This gives each strand extra strength and a bouncy look.- Hydrolyzed silk gently wraps each strand of hair, giving it a silky smoothness and shine. So your hair shines and feels good to the touch.- The hydrolysed protein blend nourishes and strengthens hair in a versatile way, maintaining its health and giving it long-lasting volume. - The amino acids in the composition nourish and strengthen each hair strand to give it strength.
How To UseShake the bottle well and spray onto the roots or the entire length of the hair. You can then style to your preference to achieve that perfect volume and bouncy texture.

product_name: *TIMEDEAL*  Collagen Coating Hair A+ Muscle Curl Cream (CER-100) 120ml
description:
Description

- A hair cream that saves your time in the morning!
- This soft, lightweight formula that helps complete the styling you want.
- Helps detangle your curly hair and leaves a natural-looking look.
- Formulated with plant-based oils and extracts to moisturize and nourish your hair.

How To Use
1. Apply a moderate amount to wet hair, distribute evenly and set the style you desired.
2. Blow dry your hair afterwards.

Key Ingredients
Water, Propylene Glycol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Glycerin, PVP, Polyacrylamide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Fragrance, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Tromethamine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Laureth-7, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Isohexadecane, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 80, Disodium EDTA, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Sorbitan Oleate, Cyclomethicone, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Gelatin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Avena Sativa (Oat) Protein Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Origanum Vulgare Extract, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein

reviews.title: fantastic styling product for anyone with curly ha…
reviews.content: The *Collagen Coating Hair A+ Muscle Curl Cream (CER-100)* (120ml) is a fantastic styling product for anyone with curly or textured hair. It works wonders to define curls while providing a smooth, frizz-free finish. The collagen-infused formula helps to strengthen and nourish the hair, leaving it feeling soft, bouncy, and healthy. It’s not heavy or greasy, so it doesn't weigh down curls but instead adds volume and long-lasting shape. The 120ml size is perfect for regular use without running out too quickly. If you’re looking for a cream that enhances your curls while keeping them moisturized and defined, this product is definitely worth trying!

reviews.content: This product is great for curly hair—it helps define the curls while keeping them soft.

original_name: [Elizavecca] *TIMEDEAL*  Collagen Coating Hair A+ Muscle Curl Cream (CER-100) 120ml

description:
Description

- This hair shadow formula is infused with nourishing Rosehip Fruit Oil and comes in various shades for the most natural-looking match according to your hair color.
- The included applicator puff makes touch-ups easy even on-the-go.
- Pang Pang Puff & Mirror, Use the included Pang Pang Puff to lightly tap for easy application.
 
How To Use
Use the convenient, cushiony "Pang Pang Puff" to apply needed amount by lightly tapping puff along hairline.
 
Key Ingredients
[01 Dark Brown] TALC, MAGNESIUM POTASSIUM FLUOROSILICATE, IRON OXIDES (CI 77499), POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE, MICA, POLYETHYLENE, DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, IRON OXIDES (CI 77492), OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYPROPYLSILSESQUIOXANE, CAPRYLYL METHICONE, DEHYDROACETIC ACID, WATER / AQUA / EAU, ALCOHOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, DEXTRIN, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER WATER, GLYCERIN, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, TOCOPHEROL, PROPANEDIOL, CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED OIL, PANTHENOL, CERAMIDE NP, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, GLYCINE MAX (SOYBEAN) SEED EXTRACT, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT LYSATE, DISODIUM EDTA
 
[02 Light Brown] TALC, MAGNESIUM POTASSIUM FLUOROSILICATE, IRON OXIDES (CI 77499), IRON OXIDES (CI 77492), POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE, MICA, POLYETHYLENE, DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYPROPYLSILSESQUIOXANE, CAPRYLYL METHICONE, DEHYDROACETIC ACID, WATER / AQUA / EAU, ALCOHOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, DEXTRIN, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER WATER, GLYCERIN, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, TOCOPHEROL, PROPANEDIOL, CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED OIL, PANTHENOL, CERAMIDE NP, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, GLYCINE MAX (SOYBEAN) SEED EXTRACT, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT LYSATE, DISODIUM EDTA
 
[03 Natural Black] IRON OXIDES (CI 77499), MAGNESIUM POTASSIUM FLUOROSILICATE, TALC, POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE, MICA, POLYETHYLENE, DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, DIMETHICONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYPROPYLSILSESQUIOXANE, CAPRYLYL METHICONE, DEHYDROACETIC ACID, WATER / AQUA / EAU, ALCOHOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, DEXTRIN, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER WATER, GLYCERIN, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, TOCOPHEROL, PROPANEDIOL, CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED OIL, PANTHENOL, CERAMIDE NP, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, GLYCINE MAX (SOYBEAN) SEED EXTRACT, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT LYSATE, DISODIUM EDTA

original_name: [mise en scene] All New Hello Bubble (12 colors)

description:
Description


WHO IS I DEW CARE: Seriously Fun Skincare. We make fun formulas that seriously work. Smile-inducing K-beauty for her, him, they, and everyone. 
 ABOUT HAIR FRANCHISE: Root franchise that cleans the scalp, protects hair, and boosts volume will help keep your scalp and hair feeling/looking healthy! 

How To Use
Pat 3 to 5 times on the desired hair area. Shake out the excess powder with your fingertips and tidy up your hair to finish.


Key Ingredients

15% root boosting powder, 10 ppm black ginseng, and biotin quickly refreshes and mattifies the hair roots and helps make hair look fuller.
